competitors.name: ANSYS
competitors.notes: Market leader in engineering simulation software

context: In 2020, Altair competed in engineering simulation and data analytics markets. The company's HyperWorks suite competed against ANSYS and Dassault SIMULIA. Altair differentiated with optimization-focused simulation and units-based licensing model. The pandemic accelerated digital engineering adoption. Altair expanded into data analytics and AI with acquisitions.
